verses.verse: And it came to pass on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

and he said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> thee a <S%H1241><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%> of the herd for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and a ram <S%H352><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, and offer <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> ye a <S%H8163><s%> he-goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; and a calf <S%H5695><s%> and a lamb <S%H3532><s%>, both a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H8549><s%>, without blemish, for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>;

and an ox <S%H7794><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for peace-offerings <S%H2076><s%>, to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>: for to-day <S%H3117><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeareth unto you <S%H7200><s%>.

And they brought <S%H3947><s%> that which Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and all the congregation <S%H4150><s%> drew near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> that ye should do <S%H6213><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall appear unto you <S%H7200><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Draw <S%H7126><s%> near unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and offer <S%H6213><s%> thy sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and thy burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for thyself <S%H5971><s%>, and for the people; and offer <S%H6213><s%> the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
So Aaron <S%H175><s%> drew near unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and slew <S%H7819><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, which was for himself.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> presented <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> unto him <S%H2881><s%>; and he dipped his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> out the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

but the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the liver <S%H3516><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, he burnt <S%H6999><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the skin <S%H5785><s%> he burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> delivered <S%H4672><s%> unto him the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And they delivered <S%H4672><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto him <S%H5409><s%>, piece by piece, and the head <S%H7218><s%>: and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.
And he washed <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%>, and burnt <S%H6999><s%> them upon the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he presented <S%H7126><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>'s oblation <S%H7133><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> the goat <S%H8163><s%> of the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> which was for the people <S%H5971><s%>, and slew <S%H7819><s%> it <S%H2398><s%>, and offered it for sin, as the first <S%H7223><s%>.
And he presented <S%H7126><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and offered <S%H6213><s%> it according to the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>.

And he presented <S%H7126><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> his hand <S%H3709><s%> therefrom <S%H6999><s%>, and burnt it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, besides <S%H905><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

He slew <S%H7819><s%> also the ox <S%H7794><s%> and the ram <S%H352><s%>, the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%>, which was for the people <S%H5971><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> delivered <S%H4672><s%> unto him the blood <S%H1818><s%>, which he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>,

and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the ox <S%H7794><s%> and of the ram <S%H352><s%>, the fat tail <S%H451><s%>, and that which covereth <S%H4374><s%> the inwards <S%H3629><s%>, and the kidneys, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%>:
and they put <S%H7760><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the breasts <S%H2373><s%>, and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

and the breasts <S%H2373><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; as Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> toward the people <S%H5971><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H3381><s%>; and he came down from offering <S%H6213><s%> the sin-offering <S%H6213><s%>, and the burnt-offering <S%H6213><s%>, and the peace-offerings <S%H2403><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and came out <S%H3318><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And there came <S%H3318><s%> forth fire <S%H784><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%>: and when all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H7442><s%>, they shouted, and fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%>.
